pages.terms-conditions: Cozy Linens - Terms and Conditions Cozy Linens Home Catalog Contacts About Us Contact Us Terms of Use Welcome to Cozy Linens! We will approve link requests from these organizations if we decide that: (a) the link would not make us look unfavorably to ourselves or to our accredited businesses; (b) the organization does not have any negative records with us; (c) the benefit to us from the visibility of the hyperlink compensates the absence of Cozy Linens; and (d) the link is in the context of general resource information. pages.about: Discover Cozy Linens - Your Partner for Comfortable Sleep Cozy Linens Home Catalog Contacts About Us Contact Us About Our Company We are a team of professionals who care about your comfort and coziness. Our company "Cozy Linens" specializes in selling high-quality bedding, created to make your sleep as comfortable and pleasant as possible. We take pride in offering only the best bedding, made from natural and high-quality materials. We carefully select each set to ensure that it meets our high standards of quality. Our mission is to create comfort and coziness in your bedroom. We believe that quality sleep is the foundation of health and well-being, so we do everything possible to ensure that our bedding helps you relax and enjoy every night. We value each of our customers and are ready to provide you with the best service and support at every stage of your purchase. Our team is always ready to help you with your choice and answer any questions you may have, so that you can make the right decision. Thank you for choosing our company "Cozy Linens". We hope that our bedding will become your reliable and cozy companion on the path to healthy and peaceful sleep. Cozy Linens Create coziness together with Cozy Linens - your source of comfort and beauty for home. Shop no. 56B, 1, TJunction, Sion-Bandra Link Rd, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400017, India +91 124 620 1463 cozylinens@gmail.com Privacy Policy Disclaimer Privacy Policy Terms of Use Site Pages Home Catalog Contacts About Us
pages.catalog: Explore Our Quality Bedding Collection - Cozy Linens Cozy Linens Home Catalog Contacts About Us Contact Us Welcome to our bed linen catalog! Here you will find a wide selection of high quality bedding sets designed to make your sleep truly cozy and comfortable. Discover a variety of colors, patterns and fabrics to find the perfect option to suit your preferences and needs. We are sure that everyone will find something special for their bedroom here. Immerse yourself in a world of beauty and comfort with our bedding and create the ideal atmosphere for a healthy and restful sleep. Bedding Set "Linen Dreams" This set is made of natural linen, providing coolness in summer and warmth in winter. Feel the tenderness and comfort of natural fibers. 2000 INR Order Bedding "Romantic Roses" Luxurious set with an elegant rose pattern, will create an atmosphere of romance and coziness in your bedroom. 1500 INR Order Kids Set "Happy Animals" Bright and cozy set with images of cheerful animals, will create a joyful atmosphere in the children's room. 1200 INR Order Satin Set "Moonlight Sonata" Exquisite bedding made of soft satin, will add chic and elegance to your bedroom. 2500 INR Order Set "Sea Adventure" Refreshing set with marine motifs, will create an atmosphere of summer vacation right in your home. 1800 INR Order Bedding "Flower Mood" Gentle set with bright floral patterns, will add colors and joy to your bedroom. 1400 INR Order Set "Exotic Dreams" This set with an eastern pattern will immerse you in an atmosphere of mystery and exoticism. 2200 INR Order Bedding "Lavender Fields" Cozy set with a delicate lavender scent will help you relax and enjoy a peaceful sleep. 1600 INR Order Cozy Linens Create coziness together with Cozy Linens - your source of comfort and beauty for home. Shop no. 56B, 1, TJunction, Sion-Bandra Link Rd, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400017, India +91 124 620 1463 cozylinens@gmail.com Privacy Policy Disclaimer Privacy Policy Terms of Use Site Pages Home Catalog Contacts About Us

pages.disclaimer: Cozy Linens - Legal Disclaimer and Information Cozy Linens Home Catalog Contacts About Us Contact Us Disclaimer for Cozy Linens Welcome to Cozy Linens! Before you proceed to explore our website, please take a moment to read our disclaimer carefully. By accessing and using our website, you agree to comply with the terms and conditions outlined in this disclaimer. If you do not agree with any part of this disclaimer, we advise you to refrain from using our website. Accuracy of Information The information provided on the Cozy Linens website is for general informational purposes only. While we strive to ensure that the information is accurate and up-to-date, we make no representations or warranties of any kind, express or implied, about the completeness, accuracy, reliability, suitability, or availability with respect to the website or the information, products, services, or related graphics contained on the website for any purpose. Any reliance you place on such information is therefore strictly at your own risk. External Links Our website may contain links to external websites that are not provided or maintained by Cozy Linens. These links are provided for your convenience to provide further information. We do not endorse the content, products, or services offered by these external sites and we are not responsible for examining or evaluating the accuracy, completeness, timeliness, or validity of any information or products offered by these sites. We are not liable for any harm or damages related to the purchase or use of goods, services, resources, content, or any other transactions made in connection with any third-party websites. Intellectual Property Rights The content, design, and graphics on the Cozy Linens website are the intellectual property of Cozy Linens and are protected by copyright laws. Unauthorized use of the materials on this website, including reproduction, distribution, modification, or republication, without the prior written consent of Cozy Linens, is strictly prohibited. Limitation of Liability In no event shall Cozy Linens be liable for any direct, indirect, special, consequential, or incidental damages arising out of or in connection with the use of the information, products, services, or graphics on our website. This includes, without limitation, any lost profits, business interruption, loss of programs, or data on your information handling systems or otherwise, even if we are expressly advised of the possibility of such damages. Indemnification You agree to indemnify and hold Cozy Linens harmless from any claims, damages, liabilities, costs, or expenses (including legal fees) arising out of or related to your use of our website or any violation of these terms and conditions. No Guarantees While we make every effort to keep our website up and running smoothly, Cozy Linens does not guarantee uninterrupted access to the website. We also cannot guarantee that the website will be free from viruses or other harmful components. It is your responsibility to ensure that any content or materials downloaded from our website are free of viruses or other harmful elements. Third-Party Content Cozy Linens may display third-party advertisements, links, or promotions on our website. We do not endorse or make any representations about any third-party content, products, or services. Your interactions with any third-party content, including advertisements, are solely between you and the third party, and Cozy Linens shall not be responsible or liable for any loss or damage of any sort incurred as a result of any such interactions. Accessibility Cozy Linens is committed to ensuring that our website is accessible to individuals with disabilities. We strive to comply with the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) to make our website accessible to all users, regardless of ability. If you encounter any accessibility barriers on our website, please contact us at cozylinens@gmail.com so that we can address the issue promptly. Changes to Terms and Conditions Cozy Linens reserves the right to update or change these terms and conditions at any time without prior notice. We encourage you to review this disclaimer periodically for any changes. Your continued use of the website after the posting of changes constitutes your acceptance of those changes. Social Media Disclaimer Cozy Linens may have a presence on various social media platforms to engage with our community and share information. The views, opinions, and content shared on these platforms are solely those of Cozy Linens and do not necessarily represent the views or opinions of the social media platforms. We encourage users to engage respectfully and be aware of the platform's terms of use. Product Availability and Pricing While we strive to keep our product information and pricing accurate and up-to-date, Cozy Linens reserves the right to modify or discontinue products, services, or pricing without prior notice. We are not liable for any discrepancies in product descriptions, images, or prices. For the most accurate and current information, please contact us directly. User-Generated Content Cozy Linens may feature user-generated content, including reviews, testimonials, and images. The opinions expressed in such content are solely those of the individuals providing them and do not necessarily reflect the views of Cozy Linens. We reserve the right to use, modify, or remove user-generated content at our discretion. Security Measures While Cozy Linens implements security measures to protect against unauthorized access, we cannot guarantee the security of information transmitted over the internet. Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account information and passwords. Legal Compliance Cozy Linens operates in compliance with applicable laws and regulations. If any provision of this disclaimer is found to be unlawful, void, or unenforceable, it shall not affect the validity and enforceability of the remaining provisions. Medical Disclaimer Cozy Linens is dedicated to providing information about bedding products and related accessories. However, the content on our website is not intended to be a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition. Content Accuracy While we strive to provide accurate and reliable information, Cozy Linens makes no representations or warranties of any kind, express or implied, about the completeness, accuracy, reliability, suitability, or availability of the information, products, services, or related graphics contained on our website for any purpose. Any reliance you place on such information is strictly at your own risk. Consultation with Experts Before making any decisions or taking any actions based on the information provided on our website, we strongly recommend consulting with appropriate experts, including healthcare professionals, interior decorators, or other qualified professionals who can provide tailored advice based on your specific circumstances. Product Recommendations The product recommendations and reviews provided on the Cozy Linens website are for informational purposes only and are not endorsements. While we strive to offer objective assessments of products, individual experiences may vary. We encourage users to conduct their own research and consider their personal preferences before making purchasing decisions. Allergy Concerns Please be aware that some individuals may have allergies or sensitivities to certain materials used in bedding products. It is important to review product labels, specifications, and materials carefully to ensure they are suitable for your needs. If you have known allergies or sensitivities, consult with a healthcare professional before purchasing new bedding products. Release of Liability By using the Cozy Linens website, you agree to release, indemnify, and hold harmless Cozy Linens, its affiliates, employees, agents, and representatives from any and all claims, liabilities, damages, losses, or expenses arising out of or in any way connected with your use of our website or the information, products, or services provided herein. Contact Information If you have any questions, concerns, or feedback regarding our medical disclaimer or any other aspect of our website, please don't hesitate to contact us at cozylinens@gmail.com. Investment Risks Investing in bedding products or related industries involves inherent risks, including but not limited to market volatility, economic fluctuations, and changes in consumer preferences. Cozy Linens does not guarantee the performance or success of any investment strategies or products mentioned on our website. Past Performance Any historical performance data or trends provided on the Cozy Linens website are for illustrative purposes only and should not be relied upon as indicative of future results. Past performance is not necessarily indicative of future performance, and investment outcomes may vary. Changes to Disclaimer Cozy Linens reserves the right to modify, update, or amend this disclaimer at any time without prior notice. While we strive to ensure the safety and quality of our products, users are responsible for using them appropriately and in accordance with any instructions provided. We strive to adhere to accessibility standards and guidelines to make our website usable and navigable for everyone. If you encounter any accessibility barriers or require assistance accessing our website, please contact us at cozylinens@gmail.com, and we will do our best to accommodate your needs. By submitting content to our website, you grant Cozy Linens a non-exclusive, royalty-free, perpetual, irrevocable, and fully sublicensable right to use, reproduce, modify, adapt, publish, translate, create derivative works from, distribute, and display such content worldwide in any media.
